var.attribute2: role REQUIRED STRING 'temperature, density, enthalpy, mixture_fraction, co2, h2o, soot, specific_heat'

model.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'cc_constant, fx_constant, scalar_diss, laminar_pr, extent_rxn, tab_strip_factor, absorption_coefficient, empirical_soot, algebraic_scalar_diss, heat_loss'

Turbulence.attribute1: model REQUIRED STRING 'compdynamicprocedure, dynamicprocedure, smagorinsky, wasatch, none'

Properties.children1: ONE_OF(CHILD ColdFlowMixingModel, NewStaticMixingTable, TabProps, ClassicTable, ColdFlow)

independent_variable.attribute1: active OPTIONAL STRING 'yes, true, no, false'

velocity_type.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'flat, function, vector, file, geometry'

limiter_type.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'minmod, superbee, vanLeer, upwind, none'
OPTIONAL STRING 'minmod, superbee, vanLeer, upwind, none'

initialization.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant, taylor-green, almgren, exponentialvortex'

norm.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'LInfinity linfinity L1 l1 L2 l2'

solver.spec: REQUIRED STRING 'smg, SMG, PFMG, pfmg, SparseMSG, sparsemsg, CG, cg, Hybrid, hybrid, GMRES, gmres'

conv_scheme.spec: OPTIONAL STRING 'upwind, roe_minmod, super_bee, central, old_super_bee'

initialization.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant, step, geometry_fill, sine-x, sine-y, sine-z, gaussian, tabulated'

src.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant_src, westbrook_dryer, coal_gas_oxi, coal_gas_heat, coal_gas_devol, coal_gas_momentum, cc_inject_src, fx_inject_src, fy_inject_src, fz_inject_src, tab_rxn_rate, cc_intrusion_inlet, fx_intrusion_inlet, fy_intrusion_inlet, fz_intrusion_inlet, do_radiation, rmcrt_radiation, bowman_nox, wasatch_expr, pc_transport'

constant.need_applies_to: type constant_src, fx_inject_src, fy_inject_src, fz_inject_src, cc_inject_src

model.attribute2: type REQUIRED STRING 'KobayashiSarofimDevol, YamamotoDevol, ConstantModel, SimpleHeatTransfer, XDrag, YDrag, ZDrag, ShaddixHeatTransfer, EnthalpyShaddix, CharOxidationShaddix'

initialization.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'env_constant, constant, env_step, step'
